txt.en: Talk to Ondor in nan Curunir

'The evil matron of this particular Warg-pack has unleashed yet another litter of the filthy beasts upon the world. She may not look like much, but when I was sneaking about earlier, I saw her pups strip the flesh off of an entire ox in a just a few minutes... which gives me an idea.\n\n'That evil spice you made... there is a bit left, yes? A light sprinkle of that into the pups' next meal ought to keep them subdued while you deal with their mother!'

'Well, that should take care of the matron then. I am afraid her pups are probably too tough to expire to a single dose of that spice, but I don't think I could bring myself to kill off a bunch a pups anyway, even if they are Wargs.\n\n'I will regret that in a few months when they are gnawing on my entrails, mind you.'
Ondor has warned you against underestimating the Warg-matron. She has a hungry brood of pups every bit as vicious and hateful as she is.
You have defeated the Black Matron
The horse-meat takes on an even more unhealthy pallor
Poison the horse meat and defeat the Black Matron

The Warg-matron can be found in the caves of western Nan Curunír.\n\nOndor suggested a way to defeat the Warg-matron, using the deadly spice to subdue her pups by tainting the horse-meat they feed upon.
Talk to Ondor in Nan Curunír
Ondor is encamped near the caves of western Nan Curunír.\n\nYou should tell Ondor that the Warg-matron has been defeated.
